comment: "I was contacted by an editor at Ebony and asked how quickly I could turn around a piece. I was offered a rate, accepted, submitted it ahead of deadline and waited. The editor who contacted me vanished. No response after a year. No payment either. Legacy magazine or not, never again will I submit there without a binding contract."
